com.jfoenix.controls.cells.editors.base

Interface EditorNodeBuilder<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleTextFieldEditorBuilder, IntegerTextFieldEditorBuilder, TextFieldEditorBuilder

    public interface EditorNodeBuilder<T>

    Editor Builder

    this a builder interface to create editors for treetableview/tableview cells

    Since:
    2016-03-09

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelEdit()
      This method is called when the editor cancel editing the cell
      javafx.scene.layout.Region createNode(T value, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> keyEventsHandler, javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.Boolean> focusChangeListener)
      This method is will create the editor node to be displayed when editing the cell
      T getValue()
      This method is used to get the current value from the editor node
      void setValue(T value)
      This method is used to update the editor node to corresponde with the new value of the cell
      void startEdit()
      This method is called when the editor start editing the cell
      void updateItem(T item, boolean empty)
      This method is called when the editor updates the visuals of the cell
      void validateValue()
      This method will be called before committing the new value of the cell

    • Method Detail

      • startEdit

        void startEdit()
        This method is called when the editor start editing the cell

      • cancelEdit

        void cancelEdit()
        This method is called when the editor cancel editing the cell

      • updateItem

        void updateItem(T item,
                boolean empty)
        This method is called when the editor updates the visuals of the cell
        Parameters:
        item - the new item for the cell
        empty - whether or not this cell holds a value

      • createNode

        javafx.scene.layout.Region createNode(T value,
                                      javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> keyEventsHandler,
                                      javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.Boolean> focusChangeListener)
        This method is will create the editor node to be displayed when editing the cell
        Parameters:
        value - current value of the cell
        keyEventsHandler - keyboard events handler for the cell
        focusChangeListener - focus change listener for the cell
        Returns:
        the editor node

      • setValue

        void setValue(T value)
        This method is used to update the editor node to corresponde with the new value of the cell
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the cell

      • getValue

        T getValue()
        This method is used to get the current value from the editor node
        Returns:
        T the value of the editor node

      • validateValue

        void validateValue()
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will be called before committing the new value of the cell
